metadata.description: FDA regulatory tools for medical device 510(k) analysis, predicate extraction, and submission preparation. v5.22.0 includes advanced intelligence suite with workflow automation, semantic search, and ML-powered recommendations.

plugins.name: fda-tools
plugins.description: ⚠️ BREAKING CHANGE v5.22.0: Plugin renamed from fda-predicate-assistant to fda-tools. See migration guide. | AI-powered FDA 510(k) regulatory assistant with 43 commands, 8 agents, and advanced intelligence suite — Phase 5: workflow orchestration, streaming processor, semantic search, device clustering | Phase 4: smart predicate recommendations (ML-powered), automated gap analysis | Phase 3: MAUDE peer comparison, competitive intelligence, review time predictions | Phase 1-2: data provenance tracking, quality validation, CFR citations, clinical data detection, FDA standards intelligence, predicate chain validation | Core features: predicate extraction, substantial equivalence analysis, submission drafting, FDA review simulation, safety surveillance, guidance lookup, and full eSTAR export | 96.6% test pass rate, research use only
